titles.title: Be Ye Holy As I Am Holy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be ye holy as I am holy.
Be ye holy as I am holy.
Be separated unto Me
Touch not the unclean thing.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I will receive you,
And I will be a Father unto you,
And ye shall be My family,
Saith the Lord Almighty,
Saith the Lord Almighty.
